  • Konstruktordetails

    • MapParser

      public MapParser(InputStream inputStream)
      Creates a MapParser instance from an InputStream. It parses the JSON and creates the internal board representation.

  • Methodendetails

    • getSelectedMapAsJSON

      public String getSelectedMapAsJSON(String filename)
      Returns the content of the selected map as a JSON string.
      Parameter:
      filename - The path to the JSON file.
      Gibt zurück:
      The map data as a JSON string.

    • getRegisters

      public ArrayList<Integer> getRegisters(com.google.gson.JsonElement element)
      Helper method to extract registers from a JSON element.
      Parameter:
      element - the JSON element representing an array of integers
      Gibt zurück:
      an ArrayList of registers, or null if not present

    • getBoard

      public List<List<List<Tile>>> getBoard()

    • convertTilesToFields

      public List<List<List<GameStartedMessage.Field>>> convertTilesToFields(List<List<List<Tile>>> tileBoard)
      Converts the internal Tile board into the Field format required by GameStartedMessage. This conversion extracts the tile name, board location, speed, orientations, registers, and count (for lasers and checkpoints) and packages them into a Field.
      Parameter:
      tileBoard - the board represented as a nested List of Tile objects
      Gibt zurück:
      the board represented as a nested List of GameStartedMessage.Field objects
